title: Development of Blog-Based Science Teaching-Learning Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Science Pedagogy Knowledge and Digital Device Utilization Skills
context.additional_context: A course for pre-/in-service teachers aged 40+ to improve science pedagogy using blog tools in offline classrooms

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three principles of designing blog content suitable for the science curriculum.
Learners can collaboratively create instructional materials with peer teachers using blog tools at least twice.
Learners can evaluate the educational effectiveness of blog-based learning activities in at least three categories.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
